             <!-- standard content - always visible -->
             <h2 id="ctl01_ContentPlaceHolder1_h2Title">
              Welcome To Coleridge House Medical Centre
             </h2>
             <div class="Content">
              <p>
               <em>
                Established since 1989, we are a friendly practice dedicated to serving your healthcare needs.
               </em>
              </p>
              <p>
               <strong>
                For all patients registered at this surgery, your named GP is Dr Nisha Kedia.
               </strong>
              </p>
              <p>
               For more than 20 years, we have prided ourselves in listening to patients’ views, ensuring that we give you the very best quality care and adapting our services to your convenience as much as possible. Our team of doctors, receptionists and other staff work together to give you not only an efficient and professional service, but also to make your experience pleasant and straightforward. Find out more about our commitment to you in the Patients’ Charter.
              </p>
              <p>
               We are pleased to announce that the surgery has recently been completely refurbished and is now able to offer wheelchair access to the ground floor. Access to the building is via a ramp form the side gate on the right hand side of the premises (on the main road). Nurse and Doctor rooms are located on the ground floor.
              </p>
             </div>
             <!-- to be shown under standard content -->
             <div class="panel panel-cqc">
              <h3>
               Information from the Care Quality Commission
              </h3>
              <div class="panel-body">
               <div class="row">
                <div class="col s6">
